mapper.select: SELECT EMAIL, NAME, PASSWORD, USERACCESSTOKEN, USERREFRESHTOKEN, USERSEQNO, ADDRESS, BIRTH, PHONE FROM user WHERE EMAIL=#{email} AND PASSWORD=#{password}
SELECT FINTECH_USE_NUM FROM USERACCOUNT WHERE FINTECH_USE_NUM = #{fintech_use_num}
SELECT REGDATE, SUM(USEMONEY) AS TOTALUSEMONEY FROM RESERVEBOARD WHERE EMAIL = #{email} GROUP BY REGDATE ORDER BY REGDATE
SELECT REGDATE, SUM(USEMONEY) AS TOTALUSEMONEY FROM RESERVEBOARD WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND REGDATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY REGDATE ORDER BY REGDATE

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN expense_type = '커피' THEN amount ELSE 0 END) AS coffeeTotal, SUM(CASE WHEN expense_type = '담배' THEN amount ELSE 0 END) AS cigaretteTotal, SUM(CASE WHEN expense_type = '택시' THEN amount ELSE 0 END) AS taxiTotal, SUM(CASE WHEN expense_type IN ('커피', '담배', '택시') THEN amount ELSE 0 END) AS amountTotal FROM expense WHERE YEAR(date) = #{year} AND MONTH(date) = #{month}
